## Phase Overview

This issue tracks Phase 1 of the VR4DEAF repository migration plan: identifying all VR4DEAF-related repositories across organizations and personal accounts.

**Related Documentation**: `MIGRATION_PLAN.md`, `REPOSITORY_AUDIT.md`

## Objectives

- [ ] Identify all VR4DEAF-related repositories
- [ ] Document repository status, ownership, and dependencies
- [ ] Categorize repositories by type and priority
- [ ] Complete repository audit document

## Organizations to Audit

- [ ] MBTQ-dev organization
- [ ] 360-Magicians organization
- [ ] Personal accounts (pinkycollie, etc.)
- [ ] Forked repositories
- [ ] Other discovered locations

## Repository Categories

### Frontend Repositories
- [ ] List and document all frontend applications
- [ ] Assess migration priority
- [ ] Identify dependencies

### Backend Repositories
- [ ] List and document all backend services
- [ ] Assess migration priority
- [ ] Identify dependencies

### AI/ML Repositories
- [ ] List and document all AI/ML modules
- [ ] Assess migration priority
- [ ] Identify model artifacts

### Developer Tools
- [ ] List and document all developer tools
- [ ] Assess migration priority
- [ ] Identify common utilities

### Documentation
- [ ] List and document all documentation repos
- [ ] Assess migration priority
- [ ] Identify content to preserve

## Deliverables

- [ ] Complete `REPOSITORY_AUDIT.md` with all repositories
- [ ] Create `docs/migration/audit-findings.md` with analysis
- [ ] Present findings to stakeholders
- [ ] Get approval to proceed to Phase 2

- **Start Date**: [DATE]
- **Target Completion**: 1 week from start

## Success Criteria

- All VR4DEAF-related repositories identified and documented
- Clear categorization of each repository's purpose and status
- Stakeholder agreement on audit completeness
- Approved plan for Phase 2
